You are assisting with an academic literature review on the topic: "{topic}".

You will be provided with a list of literature summary points. Each entry contains a summary point (text summarizing a finding or insight) and a list of supporting articles (semicolon-separated list of article IDs)

Some summary points and supporting articles may overlap.

your task is to:
	1.	Identify and merge overlapping or related summary points.
	2.	Write several paragraphs (as many as needed) that summarize the insights from the provided summary points.
	3.  Cite the articles after each paragraph in a parenthesis.

Summaries should be written clearly and formatted for an academic report.

---
{joined_entries}
